Really satisfied with a simple App that imbibes the habit of saving tons of money. Really useful without any kind of fake promises. True to the word. Premium is really worth the money

Great application, I have purchased the premium version recommended to frbds Aswell.. all features are good.. only thing is debt function dies not work..pls fix that apart from this the application is bang on

ok for tracking but really irritating in parts. doesn't shut up about pushing notifications or budgets or stuff I don't want to use. only has options of "remind me later" and not "never show this again". shut up, get out of the way and let me use the app the way I want to. sort of regretting buying this tbh.

content: Reposting the review after 1.5 years of use it is an wonderful application to track the expenses, but I'm having one problem while adding the expenses and that is sometimes some appliactions give discount while paying the credit card payment which we do from the bank account to it becomes mismatch with the bank so I have adjust the bank account with the discount, so i think it would to great to add if any discount while adding the expense so it would not be deducted from the bank account.
replyContent: Hey Priyank, thank you for your wonderful review! I'm glad to hear that you've been enjoying the app and liked the new features. Your support and encouragement mean a lot as I continue to add new features and improve the app.

content: I was quite happy with the app and bought the lifetime subscription. I've tried a few expense apps, but this one is by far the best. Logging expenses takes seconds, and the charts make understanding my spending habits a breeze. It's really helped me identify areas where I can save money. Great for anyone who wants a simple but powerful way to manage their finances.

Been looking for a simple app to track my expenses and also has tags available. I was using cashew for a little bit originally but this won me over cause the UX / UI feels better. content: A very excellent app for tracking and managing your expenses. Subscription for premium is worth. Allows creating our own categories and budget. it gives in depth analysis and you know where you need to save or cut down on expenses. Keep up the good work!

To be honest i never thought i would buy to the premium. This thing is amazing. From ui to ux to finding help! You guys have baned it. This is legit what i wanted. I somehow felt the transfer option between different sources isn't making sense since the numbers aren't changing up. Had a bit of a confusion there. But overall Amazing app!
replyContent:
Hi Karthik,

Thanks for your word of appreciation! It's what keeps us going. Transfer transactions are neither counted as expense nor as income but helps you to track transfers between your different payment methods. If you need further clarification on this, please write to us at help@expensesmanager.in.

Thanks,
Expenses Manager Team

content: I have tried so many expense manager apps but nothing worked for me, I always went back to my diary coz those apps overcomplicated things, tracking smses for cash withdrawal and counting as an expense, but I want to track how I spend that cash I spend!! Thanks, 
Expenses Manager Team

content: After UI overhaul, entering data is become cumbersome. There is no auto capitalize. Not enjoyable. UX could be lot more better. Also I can't set the balance for an individual month nor can I edit the carry forward balance. And I am premium subscribed and I am asked to buy subscription!

Finally found which I'm looking for from last 2 months. Best expanse tracker app among all available on play Store. Simple and easy to use. No ads even for free version. One suggestion to Dev. : if possible pls remove authentication for Show Balance tab in Accounts section as i already set authentication for whole app so it's annoying for me to do same thing again to check my account balance.

It's pretty much everything I had been looking for in an expense management app. Have tried multiple apps, premium, free, self-hosted. This is by far the most complete for use in India! The rest are more International centric!

I liked the app for its simplicity and also bought premium. But found that the app automatically changes balance remaining for unknown reasons in some accounts. Good to have a feature to know the atleast daily balance in each account, which is very important to tally with bank accounts.

After checking out some apps I find this one more appealing. Therefore bought the Lifetime Subscription after checking that they won't share my Financial data with any third party and to support the developer. Keep the updates coming Developer. Suggestion: Please change the location of Bill Pic upload button to somewhere else as it's not easy to use. 5/5 from me
replyContent:
Hi Rohit,

Thanks for the appreciation. We hope you continue to use the app and it helps you in saving and managing your hard-earned money. We will fix this issue in our upcoming updates.

Thanks,
Expenses Manager Team

content: It's a very efficient a helpful app to track ones expenses. Just one feature I would like you people to add, which is to let one manually create a category for budget and expenses. Otherwise, this is a very good app, one of my favorites. Keep it up!üëçüôÇ

content: Awesome app. Keep it up. I just love the UI now and it's helping me personally too. Just a suggestion, there are some expenses which happen sometime and can be considered as monthly expense ex- househelp salary or unexpected expense of home etc. These can be approximated to be spread over month so that average/day is correct. There should be an option while entering the expense to spread it equally over the month/days.

Overall nice app. It would be useful if you add the following features: Market exchange rates, approximate currency conversions as most people travel to different places and use different currencies (not just changing the money symbol), a different app icon for premium members, widget on the home page to view account balances. Also, a search bar in tags and reminders would be great üëç

content: Overall this is the best app so far I've used. I just have a suggestion that there should be a widget for this app so that one can set that on home page and easily and fastly add up the details. content: A nice app with privacy as a centre point. But I am not able to figure out how to seed the data for the past transactions. content: The app is great, but there is always a room for improvements. The Backup system should be like Whatsapp, the current backup system is not good at all whenever i backup on google drive it creates a new file instead of maintaining a single file which makes it really inconvenient for users like me who use multiple devices. Instead it should be like whatsapp it should maintain a single file as a backup so that we dont have to select.

So far the experience is good. However the one thing that it lacks is a way to record lending and borrowings from friends and families. If only there was a mechanism to record who I have landed my money too and from whom I have borrowed. It is a significant feature that one needs to have proper control on the finances.

It's pretty good but still, not good enough. The premium is expensive compared to a lot of the great options on the Play Store. And critically for me, the almost-forced Google sign in is very bad. You could just have encrypted backups over SAF like Signal does for example, which would support Nextcloud, Filen, Proton Drive, etc. The developer did previously address a lot of feedback from me, so I'm glad about the development :)

The money greedy developer. charges are too high as compared to other apps. and even there are a lot of features missing. no widgets. no debt management. if you have to pay or I must say that if you are bound to pay for a budgeting app what is the purpose of budget?

Not for family expense tracking. Family does all expense from same bank account/credit card. But data/expense entries made on multiple devices doesn't sync on all devices. Its only for individual expense tracking on single device. Seems that the app uses your local device storage and doesn't sync data on other device that has been logged in with same expense manager account. That's a big setback of this app.
replyContent: Hi Ritesh, we prioritize the privacy of your financial data by storing it locally on your device, which is why currently we do not offer a sync feature across multiple devices. We appreciate your feedback & we'll consider incorporating secure sync functionalities in future updates while maintaining privacy.

content: One of the best apps in the Play Store and coincidentally the best finance app for me. There has never been a day without Expense Manager. content: really helps to keep track of finance... very user friendly

For your usual expenses tracking it get the job done alongside some useful features. I have tried many finance tracking apps and this one sticks to my eyes. Love the app. Could have a major improvement on the user profile. If I am using the app on multiple devices, it is difficult to sync the data. Also, adding family members to collaborate on the expenses could be added.

The minimum basic features available given in pro version only . Just for Entering Income and Expense only possible that too number of categories are less, So Discontinued. Done! :)

Cheers,
Team Walnut

replyContent: Hello. To do this, click the "regular payments" section in the side menu. If you have any questions or have any other suggestions, write to us from the ‚ÄúContact the Developer‚Äù section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: The app is good. It's unfortunate that right after the day I downloaded it, they started with the ads support. But the reason for not giving it 5 stars is that after adding my expenses for the day, the account balance is always a few cents short from the real number, meaning that I always have to edit the balance myself. So I can't rely on the app for giving me the exact amount I have in my bank account and it's inconvenient. I have already turned off the rounding option but that's not it.
replyContent: Hello. You can disable rounding. To do this, click in the side menu "settings", then move the checkbox opposite "do not round". If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements! We will be grateful if you give us 5 stars)

content: Excellent app. Very useful to track your expenses. Works in multiple currencies. I am using this app for over a year for our world travel. The only problem I have discovered was that the balance will change if the exchange rate of the currency changes. Seems that the balance in the base currency is recalculated every time the exchange rates are changed. Would be better to have the base currency amount registered at the time of entry, because this is when it was taken from your bank account.
replyContent: Hello. In order for us to understand the problem, please send a video to contact.innimx@gmail.com

content: I'd give it 5 stars, but the inability to add expenses and incomes in the future is really troublesome. I plan the entire month ahead and having to wait for the next month to occur before being able to plan it is really stupid. Why don't you let us add everything whenever we want? It's not like we are going to break the app or something. I know this is a quick and easy fix. Just remove date validation and it will be a 5-star app for me. One year later and still not able to add future dates...
replyContent: Hello. This feature is available in the app.To do this, click on the "Recurring payments" section in the side menu. If you have any questions or have any other suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I don't mind that it's manual but despite being very simple, it can get confusing very easily if you're not on top of it. I thought I entered in my transactions and income correctly but somehow there's still usually some mistake and the numbers are off. And it defaults to show my total amount instead of my preferred checking. I thought I had it set up to show my checking as my primary but I guess not. It's getting frustrating. I wish I knew a way to link my account if there is at all.
replyContent: Hello. Write to us a detailed description of the problem from the section "contact the developer".

content: I love this app and it's very helpful You can create all the categories you want, it's super easy to change/edit or delete and the colors help a lot when you need to see where you money goes and how to save it ! I personally chose to put all the important expenses in cold tones and to use warmer colors for hobbies, gifts, and things like that, so I can easily see what I spent money on recently (The transaction details helps a lot too when you want to check if you wrote everything down correctly with you bank account)

Great app. It has really helped me to sort out my financials. I hope though that they will add more icons in the near future, and perhaps include a border feature that you can include to your icons. I mean there are only so much colors in the spectrum that eventually it would go stale. More customization for icons would hopefully be accepted.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates!

content: Good app, but very manually intensive. Every entry must be manually entered on the day of or previous days. No way to set reoccurring salary, debt, payments, etc. Or to do anything with a future date. This app is only good if you don't have a lot transactions on your account. If you have more than one account and lots of auto transactions this will not work for you.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates!

content: Overall, it is a very basic money tracker allowing you to setup your own budget for any custom categories you'd like to make. You'll see the amount of money spent or gained on each categories over the course of multiple different time ranges (Weekly, monthly, yearly, and custom ranges). The manual labor of writing down each purchase is a great habit to keep on eye on your expenses. I only wish it allows for single purchases made for future days.
replyContent: Hello. Thank you for the offer. We will try to implement this in the future. Sincerely, the Finance support team.

content: Been searching money managing APPs for a while, and by far this is the best free APP! It can set budget and create multiple accounts, got every feature I want! I do think it would be nice if the APP could set a default account, though. Thanks for this amazing app! You have no idea how long I've been searching forüòÇ Edit: OMG THANK YOU!!! I found it nowüòÇ
replyContent: Hello. This can be done in the application settings.

content: I like the app. I'm able to organise my expenses how ever it would appreciate it if there was a feature added that allowed you to create a separate saving account that doesn't affect your main one. For example, if I wanted to put away money from mu salary for groceries, I'd have to work that out in my head and just manage the main account with the grocery money already gone. Update: that feature was already there I didn't realize until after I made my review. Giving this a five for now.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

content: The application is more than wonderful, but it needs something added to become more complete, which is the amount expected to be spent on each type in a month. Let it be food. For example, I am expected to spend 1,000 pounds on it in a month, and everything I spent will be deducted from this amount so that I know how much I have left and whether I am saving more or not. I do not exceed the budget. I hope I conveyed the idea. Once again, thank you
replyContent: Hello. You can set a budget for each category for one month and a year. To do this, click on the "categories" side menu, select the desired icon and enter the amount. After that, you need to click on the "month" or "year" tab - the amount of expenses and the set amount for this category will be indicated under the diagram.

content: This is one of the best money manager plan I've used. I just wish there's a function where we can jot down our shopping list and plan budgets for our expenses.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates! If you have any questions or other suggestions, please write to us from the "Contact the developer" section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I've deleted this and switched to a different budget tracker because of the ads. I understand that the free version is supported by ads but having sound-on ads *when the phone is on silent* was the (embarrassing) last straw. If it was a single payment to remove ads I would pay, but I'm not paying a subscription for that - it's money down the drain. On the plus side, it's easy to set categories and set up recurring payments, and to review categories of spending by day, week, month & even year.
replyContent: Hello. The application has the option of a one-time purchase of premium forever. If you have any questions or have any other suggestions, write to us from the ‚ÄúContact the Developer‚Äù section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: It's a really good app and I love that we can make different categories for (nearly) anything. For the time being, the only issue I have is that there are very limited choices for colors and that's quite disappointing. There should have had infinite choices for colors (like a color wheel or color hex code) for categories to be more dynamic. Also the percentage isn't as precised as I'd want it. I'd rather see "73.33%" than just "73%". Other than that, this app is fantastic!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates! If you have any questions or have any other suggestions, write to us from the ‚ÄúContact the Developer‚Äù section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I'm getting a grip on my finances thanks to this app. I would love to see you add the option of splitting transactions between categories- say I go shopping and buy groceries, pet supplies and household products with one swipe of the card. It would be great if I could list that as one transaction but all 3 categories rather than divide it up into 3.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: Listen. I have no problem paying for good apps. I would've paid a fair bit to continue using this without ads: it's a pretty well made app. But waiting for people to put their data in, get comfortable using the app, and then changing it to subscription based? That's just scummy, even if the sub is cheap. Other than that, solid 4 stars.
replyContent: Hello, support and development of the application cost a lot of money. Our application is absolutely free. Therefore, we are forced to add some advertising, but with the ability to turn it off. Thanks for understanding!

content: This app is honestly great. I use it so much that I paid the fee to remove the ads which I usually never do (the fee is very small and is a one time purchase). Some things that I would like to see: 1. More app customization and widgets (ex. The app "theme" is green but being able to change to blue or another colour would be nice) 2. Being able to have a more calendar like budget view to see upcoming expenses and an actual budget planner that lets you know if you've gone over your budget, etc.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates! If you have any questions or have any other suggestions, write to us from the ‚ÄúContact the Developer‚Äù section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: It has really pleasant UI and makes it super easy to track your spending. I've been trying to budget better and so far (only a week in) it's been great. It allows you to choose categories for whatever you spend your money on and the color coordination helps me personally. It's also lowkey satisfying to do and it has definitely made me more aware of what eats up my paycheck the most. Also, the logo is cute, I wish the pig stayed on the app itself tho. Highly recommend!

Very nice app for keeping track of expenses. One thing I think can really improve though - when selecting the category for an expense, there is very little space for the name of the category. Especially when I may break down a category into multiple subcategories (eg. Food & Bev: Groceries, Food & Bev: Restaurants, Food & Bev: Alcohol, etc) I can only see the first few characters, making it hard to tell which one I'm selecting. Another suggestion on that note - subcategories would be awesome.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: Great app! love it so far, but would love it even more if a few other features were added. For each day/week/month/year I'd love to see the total balance of both income and expenses calculated, not just my current total, and also separate wallets would be great to manage bank, cash, savings, business etc separately. Otherwise, works great and much more enjoyable than just writing it all down! Keep up the good work guys üëç

By far the best budget app I've come across so far. Nothing complex like linking your bank accounts/credit cards like Mint. You just enter your expenses and income. I haven't paid a cent but I can see so many charts and graphs for my expenses. Thank you for creating this app! There's also a lot of customisable options which you don't get for free in other apps. Tip for improvement: maybe adding a few more colours, like different colours rather than just shades might help.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or have any other suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: Simple. The keyword. Which is just perfect. I have a complicated & busy life. Therefore, I want something easy to operate that I can use on the go. I want technology to work FOR me and not drain my time and brain. I have looked all over the place for something straightforward that would keep track of my spending on an everyday basis. When I'm doing more complex budget management I'll use my excel sheets - once a month. For daily updates this is brilliant and I don't hesitate to recommend it. ü•∞

So far it is a good way to track daily expenses. It has only been a few days but I like the personalized categories; the colors help me to sort bills, and rearrange as I use them. I found dark mode is better just because lighter colors don't show up against the white. If the category label remained black it would be helpful. I am using it and ignoring the pop up ads.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: Excellent app. The only thing missed on this app, is the expenses forecast. It could be the best if we are able to put the month expenses forecast, to track if we are on line with revenue and to compare the actual expenses. This must be showed also on chart for better view. Data input: We should be able - To choose the date. - To select if it's recurrent or not. Daily, weekly or monthly. - The amount. - To select the account. - To select the category. - To add comment.
replyContent: Hello. We will try to add in the future. You can set a budget for a category for one month. Click on the "Categories" side menu, select the desired icon and enter the amount. Then you need to click the "month" tab - under the diagram, the amount of expense and the set amount for this category will be indicated.

content: Has all the features I expected. So far it's free but I think even if it's paid it's worth it. You can choose dates, categories, colors, pictures. Add/Edit/Remove Categories and inputs. See your budget and Income as well as your overall balance. Not sure if there is an option to connect to a bank account but I prefer manual edits anyways. Just wonderfull. Would love to meet the person or the team behind it!! ‚ú®
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! At the moment, there is no synchronization with the bank in the application. All data must be entered manually. We will try to implement this in the future.

content: This is a great app for tracking expenses and income through multiple accounts, and even multiple currencies (exchange rate consistent with bank statement!). The only improvement that I can suggest is adding the ability to see transactions per account, for reconciliation purposes (aha! I just saw how to do this! So this app is perfect!!!). There are ads but they aren't too annoying except that you have to wait for the entire ad to run, but the volume on the ad can be turned off.

This app is exactly what I've been looking for. I can keep track of all my accounts in on place. One of my favorite things is the charts where you can see your income, profits, expenses and losses. One thing I might suggest is auto charge. I have a few bills that are the same monthly and would prefer not to manually input every month. Otherwise. Fantastic app!!!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates!

content: i love this app because its sooo simple and easy to pick up! for me, i like the fact that i have to manually input these expenses because it makes it even more of a conscious purchase/decision. it'd be nice to see the remaining balance on categories in the weekly view as well, but i understand why it isn't. additionally, i would like more variations in the color options as some of the colors are a bit too 'neon' and it'd be nice to see more muted/pastel options.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates!

content: Loving it and worth the money! Used a different app but this is better by much. Simple but can be detailed enough. Would love to be able to see how much I have on a specific date in the past as a feature. The unused space on bar chart can easily be used if it goes from top to bottom instead of left to right, just saying. It'd be nice if it shows the chart for whole year instead of a few recent months.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: The app would be great except the ads essentially force you to buy it. I can understand and tolerate ads in otherwise free software. The problem is that the app will freeze indefinitely while trying to load an ad that never loads. Sometimes when trying to enter a transaction, I'll need to wait an hour or more for it to become usable. I might pay for the app... but not because software bugs force me to!
replyContent: Hello. In order for us to understand the problem, please send a video to contact.innimx@gmail.com

content: I downloaded the app because I wanted to have my monthly income and expenses more organised. In my opinion, the app is easy to use and very organised. I really like the feature of creating custom categories with an individual color. With that, I can group "less important" categories as red, yellow, etc. so that I see where I have to "restrain" myself a bit more ... The only feature I really want is automated payments. Once it is implemented, I am thinking of even buying the ad-free version.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: Overall I like the app. The colors coding is a nice way to quickly visualize each category. However, it would make it a lot easier if you could put reoccurring payments so I'm not always inputting the same bills. And on a similar note, you can't put future payments either. The calendar cannot be selected beyond the current date.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates!

content: A lot of manual entry. Works well. Definitely an expense tracker more the a budget app. Would be really nice if you can set target goals for certain categories. For example if I want to limit my fast food expenditures to 200 a month. And it gives notifications such as: "Nice, you are on track! " or "Will be over budget!". But overall still works for what we need it ! Def recommend.
replyContent: Hello. You can set a budget for each category for one month. Click on the "Categories" side menu, select the desired icon and enter the amount. After that, you need to click the "month" tab - under the diagram, the amount of expense and the set amount for this category will be indicated.

content: I've been struggling for years to keep my finances in order, and I finally feel relief after using this app. It also allows users to keep track of multiple currency types. The visual elements of the color wheel and icons help me see instantly where I'm putting my money, and it's so simple to take a look at past numbers (either in a weekly, monthly, or yearly view---no more clicking back and forth through one million computer tabs!).

Very nice! Everything organized well. Enjoy that i can keep track of transfers. My only issue is that reoccuring payments aren't reflected in the balances/expenses until they actually happen, making it easy to overspend. Other apps I've tried will include future monthly payments in the Month view but not, say, in the Week, unless they're occurring that week. Fix that and you'll have me as a longtime fan.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: Congratulations for the app! Very easy to use! It gives you plenty of options to create your own categories of expenses/incomes, use different colors/tags for each category, name them, rearrange them, edit, add comments, etc. It has a very pleasant and flexible UI. A big plus, it exports as an Excel, even in the free version! It is maybe among the very few apps that the free version has a minimum of adds, no annoying pop ups nor watermarks. I'm so happy with it that I'll buy it. :)

Has some things I don't like at first glance. I set up my accounts randomly, but it seems there is no way to sort account order. I personally would like to sort my accounts by alphabetical order. But this is impossible so it's hard to find an account if you have many. 2nd thing is the account screen also. When the account has a long name, it cuts off the balance so you can't see it. If an accounts name is too long, it should shorten the account name but it should ALWAYS show the balance.
replyContent: Hello. We will try to fix it soon! If you have any questions or have any suggestions - write to us from the section "Contact the developer". Our team is constantly working on improvements! We will be grateful if you can give us 5 stars)

content: Really useful app for budgeting, and i love the interface. You can set monthly targets for each budget category (and you can choose the categories), and it's easy to add each expenditure. These are then shown either in 'daily', 'monthly' or 'yearly' totals, or over a time period of your choosing. My husband and I each have the app, with the same login so we can both add expenditures and keep track. As a single income household with 2 children, this is a much needed money tracker!

Love the app, but I hope the developer improve the interface especially for account list. Since my currency is quite weak with lots of zeroes, I kind of bothered with how the app keep rounding the number like 1.1M or 31M even tho the exact number will be 1,102,000 and 30,870,000. Please pls pls
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates! If you have any questions or other suggestions, please write to us from the "Contact the developer" section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I love this app! Though, I'd like to have a 'savings' function cuz now I just do a transfer between accounts and I'd like to see how much I saved a month without it going to expenses section. Also, it would be great to be able to customize the whole style (make the accent color not green, but blue or purple, for example)
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates! Profit and loss can be viewed on the chart (Charts section in the side menu).

content: Hands down THE BEST!!! It's the best app I've come across that lets you keep track of your expenses, income, transactions. You can have multiple accounts/wallets, transfer between those and deduct directly from whichever account you choose. It let you customize and categorize your expenses and income, it can do a good amount of stuff you'll find very useful for keeping track of your money. It saves the data on a cloud so no worries if the app gets accidentally deleted. Seriously love it!!

Very good free app where you can do whatever you want without paying (while other apps use the moto " you can make your budget bigger" while they ask you to pay so you can use the complete versions of their apps) keep up the good work guys. Maybe a donate button will help you a bit! P.S. Would be a good idea if we can put photos of our bills in each transaction. That way we can easily keep track of what we buy and how much cost. Maybe in the next update? thanks for making it happen!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates!

content: Great for accountability! Allows you to manage several accounts and the total of the accounts. You can create new categories of spending and add a comment to each expense or income. You can also notice trends in spending or income using the chart and you can do that by day, week, month, year or a specific period. Using this app, you'll stop wondering where all your money is disappearing to and cut out unnecessary spending or stay on budget. Able to use any currency

I've tried many other apps in this genre and none are as good to use without spending a cent as this one. You can add many accounts for free (even without an ad), it does some transactions automatically if you want that, it can remind you to pay certain bills at a specific date etc etc etc. Love it ! The best money management app I've found so far, by far !
I am a real human and I'm rating this app 5 stars üåü and if you want to know why download it and spend at least 10 minutes, you will know.

The application is overall good. But i think it would be nice if you could add a calculator to the mainscreen since the user might want to compute something and does not have to go to the add section just for the calculator there. I also want to point out that i keep getting a "loss" of money. It never matched to the amount i actually have. However, i also don't know if the problem is in my end or yours. Just want to point out the thing i am experiencing.
replyContent: Hello. You can disable rounding. To do this, click in the side menu "settings", then move the checkbox opposite "do not round". If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I've been using it for just a couple of weeks, but already can't live without. The app is great to track my spendings and see where I'm messing everything üòÖ I've tried others, but this is the most complete and user-friendly, and the best part, totally free. I'll keep the adds forever if that cute cat that reminds me of Doby keeps popping up the screen to explain why the adds are important, and the fact that I actually have the option to disable them whenever I want just makes me feel respected.

I paid for the app and other than "no more ads", Im not really sure what other benefits I gained so its more about supporting the devs. Not complaining about that at all. I do think that adding some new features that take management to the next level (eg. access to tax/bank accounts) might make it more appealing for others to pay. This app has been, and still is, one of (if not the only) efficient way Ive been able to track and "take charge of my financial freedom" (make that your slogan :P )

Amazing app. Really simple to use, and allowed me to visualize (through the built-in graphics) and inspect my spending easily. Only thing I think is missing, is that it should allow you to visualize your spendings within a certain period by the default. Like the same way it shows you daily, weekly and monthly statistic, it as should also allow you to see from day X of 1 to day X of month, since in terms of money, a "month" only starts counting once you get your paycheck.
replyContent: Hello. Click on the "period" tab above the pie chart and enter the desired numbers.

content: Ultimately, too many ads. Everytime you open it there's a 5 second ad. So if you just want to quickly go on to add an expense, that's not happening. Edit: since the ads interfere with the functionality of the app I will not be changing my rating. Non-interfering ads would be like banner ads. Definitely understand why ads are necessary, but not ads that you're forced to watch before using the app every time you open it
replyContent: Hello. Support and development of the application cost a lot of money. Our application is absolutely free. Therefore, we are forced to add some ads, but with the ability to turn them off in the side menu. Thanks for understanding! If you are satisfied with the performance of the application, then we will be grateful if you increase the rating.

content: immediately confused me, don't understand what I'm supposed to do with it, I just wanted something simple where I can enter my monthly expenses, might stick with my regular budgeting book, much easier than this
replyContent: Hello. If you have any questions or suggestions, please write to us from the "Contact the developer" section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I really like this applications and I have purchased the upgraded version to remove ads. It is easy to track your expenses and categorize them. There are few things I would like to see as improvements to the application. The ability to set up and retrieve the opening balances. The other thing is related to exporting the transfer between account data and the ability to extract a statement for each account including expenses and transfers.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do it in future updates! If you have any questions or suggestions - write to us from the "Contact the developer" section. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: The app is overall smooth but it takes more time at the time of starting the apps for animation. Please make the animation faster.
replyContent: Hello. In order for us to understand the problem, please send a video to apps-support@orangedog

content: Really wonderful app. It has everything some might need to manage finances, the interface is intuitive and beautiful. You can connect your email account to persist you data and restore it. You can manage several accounts, make transfer between accounts, set expense limit per category. There are also reminders to help you remember to manage your expenses and the app works offline. Sincerely great app. And it's free with ads, but not too much ads, it's okay.

Most streamlined finance app available - thank you! Please add more colours, an option to sort receipts by category, and add an area to breakdown spending by category (amount per category, weekly and monthly breakdown). I use the app to make sure I'm in budget with groceries, as well as to find out what our spending habits are on leisurely items and spending needs on healthcare items etc. I want to be able to create a budget that is right for us from this information.
replyContent: Hello. You can separately view income / expenses for the desired category. Click on the desired tab above the pie chart (day, week, month, year, period), and then click on the category below the chart. The amount for this category will be indicated.

content: Just what I was looking for! I submitted a query re subscription fees & got a reply saying it was 'free' - the only cost being $1.29 to remove adverts - which I did. The app is feature packed - categories, with a 'comment' to add to transactions, charts. Definitely recommended for anyone trying to see where their money goes & how to budget accordingly. Well done!

Am enjoying this app after my regular budget app crashed and is no longer working. I like the way this app displays as a graph and it's easy to use and set up. The only complaint is that if you want to purchase the version without adds there is no 'one time payment' option. Only yearly or monthly. Whilst these options are not what I'm looking for, I still love the app and intend to keep using it.
replyContent: Hello. Thanks for the offer. We will try to implement this in the future.

content: For now it works great. This app has everything I was looking for. The only thing I would like to see in the future is a way to import data via csv or xml, so I can upload my bank statements directly. Also please add a loan payback calculator or planner, it would be fantastic to have that also in one place.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates! If you have any questions or other suggestions, please write to us from the "Contact the developer" section of the application. Our team is constantly working on improvements!

content: I just installed the app, but I can already see that transfers between accounts can be a bit tedious, I mean for recurrent ones. Would be nice to have possibility to schedule transfers (and same for expenses and incomes). I'd be happy to higher my rate when this functionality is implemented. Also I have only used it for a very short time, so I will use it more and change my review later. What I can say now is that the design is nice and pretty intuitive, and all with no ads which is great!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will try to do this in future updates!

content: this app is nearly perfect! but one request to earn the 5th star: maybe you can add a secondary currency? because where i live, we use 2 currencies, so it would be way easier if i could add an expense in LBP, and it would automatically appear as USD, being the main currency (with the option to choose my own exchange rate). Thank you very much!
replyContent: Hello. You can create different accounts with different currencies. To do this, click on the ‚Äúaccounts‚Äù section in the side menu, then click on the plus. When creating an account, click on the ‚Äúselect currency‚Äù line and select the desired currency from the list. When adding expenses/income, you can select the desired account.

content: Really good features, like scheduling recurring expenses, budgeting, adding and editing categories and tags. I wish we could manually duplicate entries, almost like a template for a new entry, so you don't have to do everything from scratch all the time.

content: I'm updating that since I wrote my review, the app seems to work somewhat faster, so we're happier. But I'm not jumping from 1 star to 5 just yet, since it still has issues-the tagging feature doesn't work! Sometimes it let's us tag, and sometimes it doesn't... content: The app was good before. Before, the app used to work standalone even without internet. Once the internet was turned ON the stored data gets synced automatically. But now the app doesn't even open when there is no internet. This is a bad step in my opinion. Also, in the recent build one couldn't set the date. Seems like a bug. Kindly fix the bugs and make the app to work standalone without internet as it existed before.
replyContent: Hello, we apologize for the unfunctional calendar. We are releasing the new Spendee (5.0.25) at the beginning of the next week! Please update to the new version and this issue will be gone. You can use the Web app app.spendee.com in the meantime. Psst! We made some changes also for the performance! üêé Let us know what you think! ü§ù

content: The app is well designed and neat. Easy to use and does the job. If you pay for the plus or premium pack you get access to multiple budgets which is great for tracking your expenses. However, there seem to be a bug in the budget time period ( I started my monthly recurring budget on March 1st and my current budget time period is showing ad Nov 29th-Dec 28th. Another major flaw is the pricing. The pricing is subscription based and you have to pay yearly. There was once a limited time one-time payment unlimited subscription plan but the pricing was unreasonably high ( at least for the Indian market since majority of the popular banks are not listed and so that feature is entirely useless ). I will probably discontinue my subscription after this term considering there are many free apps which more or less has the same features.

The new version is a nightmare. I was a big fan of Spendee as a budget tracker which made me subscribe for it annually. However the new patch is terrible to use. The UI is confusing, the selection of wallets is soo forced and irritating to use. The search button is gone. What are the developers of spendee thinking of late. Wish I could rollback to the older UI. Also off late too many bugs while syncing to cloud.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and sorry to hear that you don't like the new UI. You can still search inside of each of the wallets. Please, in case of any further questions or feedback, feel free to contact us at hello@spendee.com. We'll be happy to hear it. :)

content: Need sub categories create option for the main categories of expenses. Example: in "Transport" category I need to add sub categories like petrol, Individual vehicle names and other expenses like, vehicle maintenance and travelling and parking charges. Need all bank support. The good thing is the app looks beautiful and also it is convenient for me to interact with the application. Thanks you.
replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback and review! If you have any bank suggestions, feel free to reach us at hello@spendee.com, thank you.üòä We are currently using Labels as subcategories because we believe that they are more fun and help categorize transactions in a more precise way. Labels are great for better analysis. üíö

content: I have been using Spendee for a long time. It has been a great app to track expenses. But after the last upgrade the app has become very slow. It initializes for a long time before opening. content: Update after few months of usage. (Spendee premium) Good UX design. Good bank sync options. All your transactions are in one place with simple sync button. We'll be happy to check whether there's anything we can do for you with regards to this. Happy Spendeeing! :)

content: Great app, I love it and it has probably saved me a lot of money these last few months ;) the only app that has the features and UI that I wanted, to monitor my finances across my various accounts, in different currencies. Performance is better & now the press+hold on the line graphs shows correct values properly.

content: Well this looks like a great app if and only if you only link bank accounts with cash balances. I linked my bank accounts where I have savings/checking accounts, and also credit cards. The app is reporting the balance I have on my credit card as if it were cash I had on some checking or savings account. The app is also reporting the payments I made to those credit card balances as if they were income. No, that's not right. That is money going out, not in. This app doesn't work with credit cards.
replyContent: Thank you for your review and feedback! We fetch the balance exactly as it is shown in your bank's web banking, in case the minus sign is missing in the bank's web banking, then the balance is fetched as positive, as an available credit card limit. Neverthless, we have passed this as a suggestion for improvement along to our team. üôè

content: Great for budgeting, even at the free tier. I have just a couple complaints: - There's no way to create your own categories, so you have to shoehorn some things into a category that doesn't really fit. This is alleviated by the notes (hashtags), but it would have been nice to have them actually separated. - Internally, it keeps track of transactions in USD, even when all transactions are in a foreign currency. This accumulates tiny errors, but usually it's not a big deal.

Nothing works as before since the last update. Painfully slow to start the app and add a transaction. My wife also uses it so that we control our budget but the entries are also messed up. We don't know which are gone and which are still there. Any duplicates? We can't be sure. We have to check each and every single entry for the last 4-5 years. Terrible!!! Why in the hell would you release such a bad update? Don't you even use it yourself before releasing? Shame on you. We are paying for this!!

content: Update Feb 28 - One more month has passed, and the update that was promised hasn't been released. Seriously, doubting this update even exists. I can't use the app despite having paid an annual subscription. Doesn't work since early January, the app crashes and it won't open. I just paid 1 year subscription in December and can't use the app I paid for. The app hasn't received any updates since 2022, so I don't buy it that you're working on a fix. Thieves.
replyContent: We are sorry to read such words, nevertheless, the update is in the final debugging stage and will be released shortly. ü§ì Thanks for your patience!

content: Unfortunately the app doesn't deliver on its promises. There is no proper help desk, ticket management system, feel free to check out their help pages and try to find a way to create a support ticket. Emailing hello@... seems like that's how they deal with anything.   CONS:  --- there is no "select all" button, anywhere, for batch actions on transactions, you have to click checkboxes one by one - the categorization AI is really "dumb" everything ends up in other not like Mint and similar apps at all --- it's supposed to be possible import transactions but because the import function is so primitive, it's practically unusuable unless for each CSV, you are willing to first modify it on Excel yourself to make spendee understand it --- if you can't connect your bank automatically, then you have to create a "wallet" because you can't create "bank account" messing up the whole flow of incoming vs outgoing money - In their blog post on Medium the product lead says it started as a side project, it seems like it still very much is  PROS: +++ it's pretty, has a clean interface +++ works OK if you are lucky enough to have a bank they actually support. I'm emailing hello@... after this review.
replyContent: Thanks for the review. We actually have a help desk which you've just reached out to by e-mailing hello@spendee.com. We'll be in touch with you shortly and will do our best to help you! :)

content: This is an awesome free budgeting app out there. The amount of customizations you can do for your expenses type is definitely more than enough for your usage. You can only have one wallet and one budget if you're a free user, but that should be enough if you want to try. Edit Apr 2024: The latest update caused the inability to upload receipts. Attempting to refresh the bank sync ends with error "Unfortunately, we are no longer supporting this provider. Please contact our support team at hello.."
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback provided. The issue with photo upload is now being tested and worked on, therefore we value your continuing patience! üòä

content: I love this app....when it works. It is buggy and I get the "something went wrong" error message a whole lot. I also have had it double the auto pay on various days, which is a huge problem if you don't catch it. I keep deleting and downloading it again to clear the error message. It works, for now.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. Could you please reach out to us at hello@spendee.com and reference this review so we can properly troubleshoot it for you? Thanks! :)

content: Been using this app for 3 years and I love it until this unnecessary update. At first I can't log in after the updates as it went "error occured while loading data". I need to log in to my other phone. Another thing is how come the interface display doesn't show my current balance? I need to go to the browser and see it. How awful. It also lags everytime I record new expense. Please roll back to the previous update :( This one star rate will remain until I get the initial version back.

Haven't been using it for a few years and it has been great. But ever since this latest update, I havent been able to access the app. It just keep initialising with no end. Thought it would be fixed in a few days but I pop in to check on and off and I have still not been able to access. Will be switching to another more reliable expenses tracker.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. Can you please email us at hello@spendee.com so we can properly troubleshoot this for you? Thanks! üôè

content: I found this app really frustrating to use and I'm disappointed to have sunk so much time into it. I had to immediately sign up for premium after one day to keep the wallets a set up. It's not worth it, everything takes ages, you have to basically manually sync your bank every day if you want to it up to date and it takes ages. Merging a category took so long the app quit. It keeps categorising back payments wrong. I will be switching having already paid money. Don't recommend.
replyContent: We're really sorry to hear this, Asha. In case you'd be willing to give us one more shot, could you please contact us at hello@spendee.com with regards to these issues? We'll be happy to help! üôå

content: After the update the application (alse web application) is painfully slow. Addin a new transaction takes me almost a minut when I don't make a mistake. I add my transactions once per week, it is a fight. Also creating a connection to a bank account isn't working (Unicredit Bank SK). To not be only negative. I like the new look and that the labels are now separated from the notes. For the labels, it would be nice if they are ordered by usage. It would be convenient not to look for the tag I use the most.

If you are facing any issue regarding bank connection please write an email to us at hello@spendee.com and we will check this for you. ü§ó Thanks for your patience and understanding.

content: It's a good apps that I have been using years and recommended my friend. I high recommended to have a weighted features to quick add expenses. Eg quick add of food expenses. Now I have to 1. Click the app 2. press the "+" button 3. Select category 4. Key in amount 5. Save If there is a weighted, I can just 1. Click on the food weighted 2. Key in amount 3. Save It helps to reduce the step from 5 to 3. I was hoping this features but now I'm considering switching to other apps for my convenie
replyContent: Thank you for your lovely review and feedback! Rest assured, we have properly noted all your suggestions to our feature wish list. We hope to support many more features in the future! üíö

content: I can't take it anymore, I used to be a loyal user of Spendee for the last 2 years but Speende5 cannot be used, I can't change the wallet of a transaction nor delete it, it takes for ever to download my expenses and several bugs prevent me from using the app. I wish I could get back to speende 4, It had some bugs and performance issues but at least I could track my expenses. I don't know why the team decided to release an app with so many bugs and issues and release it to the public.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. üòî Our dev team is still working on the performance issues, please, bear with us a little longer. üòá

content: Have been using it for years, I like Spendee, but not happy about the last update. It is slower to start, not many features have been added and the hashtags were much easier to use than the new labels which require more steps and can't even be sorted. You also now need to pay a subscription if you want to add more than label to an item, something that used to be free in the previous version. UPDATE - been a month since the new version has been released and I've now decided to use another app.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and feedback. We're sorry to hear you've decided to leave Spendee. üò¢ Hope to see you again in the future!

content: Do not buy this app, is completely useless... All the transactions are done automatically if you set them up, but you cannot fix anything, so you don't have control of your transactions. The customer service reply but only to ask you for screenshots end at the end there's no improvement since some transactions are difficult to correct. If you are using different currencies... Don't even try, since when trying to fix the amounts, they will change only to the main currency of the account...
replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you have faced any issues. Screenshots are essential, especially in rare cases, when we do not have similar issues reported. Afterward, the problem is passed to our provider so they can investigate and check on it further, as the data from your bank are fetched, the way your bank returns the transactions to us. üôè

content: What started as a great app, slowly and steadily started falling behind. Nothing truly new to show for in the past years. Location tags never came back, the app update was a total DISASTER, it's slower and things that were fine before don't work now. Hashtags are gone and labels can't be edited. They claim "new bank connections" are coming, they have been saying that for over 2 years now. "Lifetime Membership" subscription seems like the last attempt to get more money and keep it afloat.
replyContent: Thank you for this review, we're sorry to hear you feel like the update was a disaster. üò¢ We're already working on resolving the performance issues, it's our highest priority. Our bank provider is also working on supporting more banks in the future! üôè

content: I paid for premium subscription and this app is so hard to use. I can't connect to any of my transactions to mange them correctly. They are just put into whatever categories the app decides to put them in. If I knew I had to enter them manually for any sort of results I was looking for, I would have utilized excel spreadsheets. I cant even cancel my subscription because the "web app" doesn't work. When it signs me in it just shows up as a blank page. I'm filing a dispute with my bank.
replyContent: We're sorry to hear this! The automatic categorization is taking data provided by the bank and our AI then categorizes it - it takes 4 or 5 changes to the same transactions. Regarding the subscription, you can cancel it in the Google Play Store, you don't need the Web App in order to do this. üòá

content: I had occasional issues with the app prior to the update (odd glitching while it loaded transactions etc.), but the new update has completely messed up my wallets to the point where I have to trawl through several months of transactions to find out where the errors are. For example, one large transaction prior to the update was duplicated 7 times. It's more hassle than it's worth, unfortunately.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. Can you please reach out to us at hello@spendee.com so we can properly troubleshoot this for you? Thank you! üôè

content: This app is great when it works. However, for a few weeks now, mine will not log in at all- it gets stuck 'downloading transactions'. I can use it ok on a browser, but this is not the most convenient/user friendly experience. Despite emailing their Customer Service 3 weeks ago, & nudging them since, I've not yet had a response, which is really disappointing considering I have the paid for premium version & they still have time for marketing emails! They seem to respond here, fingers crossed...
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. Our support team will contact you ASAP. We definitely appreciate your patience on this! :)

content: Love the new update. Much more intuitive than before imo. Just one thing that bugs me, it would be better if you integrated calculate tool when adding transaction. Edit: That was my feedback from years ago, before you add a calculator. Kudos to you guys. To be exact, it would be good if you could implement a currency converter if possible. However, the current version is good enough for me. Thank you.

content: First time writing a review ever because I'm hugely disappointed with the New UI. Less user user friendly than the previous. I want to track my spending in the least clicks possible. Previous UI, I only needed a single tap to track my spending in the wallet of my choice. Easy, seamless. With the new UI, tapping the '+' only calls out the last recently used wallet. It takes at least an extra 3 clicks to find the correct wallet, before I select the transaction category on this again. Why?!
replyContent: Thanks for the review and we apologize for the inconvenience. We're sorry that you don't like the new version of the app and having UI issues. Our team is working hard on speeding up the application and improve it. Thank you for patience and understanding. :)

content: I love the app. It's easy to use and fast. The problem I find is that there's this awesome feature that I cannot access because my Bank isn't listed. And that's THE FEATURE that makes this app better than any other! I'd gladly pay premium (I actually did for a year) in order to get my bank account linked with the app, but I guess my country is too little or Banks here are just not as accessible as other Banks in more "known counties". I'll gladly change my rating whenever that is solved.
replyContent: Sorry to hear this, Laura! Would you mind sharing the name of the bank with us so we can add it to our wish list? üëÄ

content: Wow, was an amazingly useful app. I had even purchased the lifetime subscription. Now rendered unusable with the latest overhaul. Just doesn't work! Frozen most of the time. You can perhaps invest in making the recognition of transactions more consistent and precise? I've spent months training the app to categorise certain expenses to be such and such, and still no improvement on that front whatsoever.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. Can you please reach out to us at hello@spendee.com so we can properly troubleshoot this for you? Thanks! üôå

content: This really is the WORST app ever!! Customer service replies to email requests at the speed of once a week!! As for features go, it does not support refunds on ANY expense category. Something as simple as an Amazon (shopping) refund cannot be adjusted against the shopping expense category. So there's no way to track your actual shopping budget. It's 2020! Everyone shops online and returns stuff. There's zero point in a budgeting app if it cannot balance incoming transactions against expenses!
replyContent: Thank you for this review. Unfortunately, we currently don't support this feature, however, it's quite high on our wish list so we'll for sure consider it in the future. At the moment, we're focusing on the stability of the app rather than implementing new features though. Hope you understand! üôå

content: In the beginning versions of Spendee I loved it, worked well with very few issues. Now, i find it had to accurately track my overall balance solely from this app. The most annoying thing is that if you set up recurring transactions, your total balance is automatically deducted from these transactions at the beginning of the month- so you always have less money reflected in your account that what is reality.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and for your feedback. The future transactions are being deducted on purpose so you have a better idea of how much money you can actually spend throughout the month. In case of any further questions or feedback, don't hesitate to contact us at hello@spendee.com.

content: You can add reoccurring transactions but I dont like how you cannot change the ammount so easily for those. The thing that kills me is the graph that lets you see what is ahead. So you can see if you have cashflow issues. The graph is accurate for the custom option. So it leaves me looking at the monthly option. It looks the current month only, so i just have to pray next month is ok for me üôè. Its a crucial part of the app for me. Want to sign the lifelong subscription but its not there yet.
replyContent: Thanks for the review! We're continually working on improving the app and its features and we'll do our best to focus on the graphs, too! In case there's anything else we can help you with in the meantime, don't hesitate to contact us at hello@spendee.com!

content: Beware! Not for long term use. I loved the UI & functionality so I stuck with the app for so long. Since past few months it's lagging like crazy whenever I open it. I reached out to the customer care and they said it's because I have a lots of data. They said they're working on a fix but its been months its still unusable. They've not optimized the app for long-term use. Even on a high-end device, if you use this app for more than 3-4 years, it'll start lagging, so be aware of that.
replyContent: Thank you, Teja, for your review and feedback, even though we are sorry that you still experience the slowness and our team is doing maximum to make the app as fast as possible. Please bear with us a little longer.üíõüêª

content: Liked the old app, with the new update it's just not as enjoyable to use...each wallet doesn't show the account total at the top like it used to, you have to exit the wallet each time when adding transactions to check the wallet balance. Just frustrating. When you're typing into the transaction description now the keyboard goes over what you're typing, when they used to easily fit on the same screen. Pretty disappointing that I pay for this app, I would not pay for it of I were a new user now.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and feedback, we apologize for the inconvenience. We are sorry that you did not like the new version of the application. We have noted your suggestions for improvement in our wish list. Thanks for your patience and understanding. üôè

content: This would be a great app except that it freezes after about 5 seconds use, and has to be closed and re-opened. Its a nuisance when recording an expense, but if I have a few expenses or if I'm scrolling through expenses t9 check if something was recorded, it's infuriating. This problem was once in a while for the first few months but recently it is every single use. (I use and pay for premium, so expect the basics to work.)
replyContent: Thank you for reaching out and we are sorry for any issues this has caused! We are working on improvements and in the meantime, we recommend clearing the app's cache and data. (Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí Spendee ‚Üí Storage ‚Üí Clear cache). We value your cooperation!üòä

content: I've used this app for at least three years. It suited my needs just fine, I preferred it to any of the other budgeting apps that are promoted. But the update really messed it all up. All of my recurring transactions had been replicated at least 15 times for each month, going back to when I first started using it. You can't edit labels anymore, only add. There was previously an option that allowed you to exclude future transactions from your reports. And the loading time is awful; it takes a good minute for my info or transactions to load. I was really loyal to this app and even recommended it to a few of my friends since it worked so well for me. But the update was just horrible. I wonder if this company even did any market research before wasting their time and effort on that garbage update. Fortunately, I found a new app that works similarly to the old Spendee. I've canceled my subscription, and deleted this since it's really not worth the money anymore and there's better stuff out there.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and feedback.Our team is working hard on speeding up the application and improving performance. Furthermore, editing, deleting, and sorting of labels will be introduced soon. üôåüèª If you are facing any issues related to transactions please email us at hello@spendee.com and we'll look at it. Thank you for your patience! üôèüèº

content: Biggest plus with this app is the biweekly budgeting. Some major down falls though. 1. If you set up budgets in Android you can't see them in iOS. 2. People you share wallets with can't see your actions in the wallet and you can't see theirs so it ends up being pointless 3. Can't change categories on "pending" transactions so they end up effecting the wrong budgets. 4 you can't set up your biweekly income. 5. Can't leave notes on credit card transactions. 6. Bank syncing is awful in android. You have to exit the app without closing it and reenter it several minutes later for it to show it did anything. All these fixed would make for an outstanding app. Mint would have you beat if they had a bi-weekly budgeting option.
replyContent: Thank you for your review! We're sorry that you have been experiencing these issues. Could you please email us at hello@spendee.com and reference this review in your email so we can properly troubleshoot this for you? Thanks! :)¬†

content: Great app but there seems to be a bug with entering a GPS location. Once I hit the submit button it will duplicate my entry several times so it seems like I spent the same amount at a location multiple times. When I try and delete the duplicate transaction, it will delete all transactions associated with that specific entry. My fix was to just type in the location under the note portion and to not put a GPS location on the entry.
replyContent: Thank you for your review! We're sorry that you have been experiencing this issue. Could you please email us at hello@spendee.com and reference this review in your email so we can properly troubleshoot this for you? Thanks! :)¬†

content: Lets me track my daily/monthly expenses and also helps me track any outstanding debts or clear them if I've paid back or been paid back. Interface is easy to use and the app is somewhat customizable. One downside is for some reason even though I've chosen Yen as my main currency, it still converts to dollar and then converts back to yen, so the amount isn't exactly the same. Maybe there's a correct way to set main currency but I've not the energy to find out.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and feedback, we're glad to hear you like the app! With regard to the currency issue, could you please reach out to us at hello@spendee.com so we can properly troubleshoot it for you? Thanks! üôåüèº

content: Tried Premium, but it wouldn't reconnect to my bank account with Halifax after the first day of setting up the app. I tried contacting technical support but never got a reply, only loads of spam emails. Can't understand how this is a paid subscription when the app doesn't work and there is no attempt to fix the connection issues. Edit- thanks for the quick response, I sent the email through the help button on your Web app. I also filled in a form sent to me by email about bank connection issues
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience this has been causing. Our support team will respond to your email ASAP. Please, bear with us till then! üôè

content: Update January 2021 It's so overwhelming so many changes they made to the app that I don't have time to relearn it all over again. We have spent many years seeing how much money was left for each budget and from one day to the next, they change it to how much you have spent just because without giving the user an option to see it according to their needs. My wallets are not syncronized and there is no option to ask for help in the app. The changes must be progressive to allow time for adaptation
replyContent: Thank you for this review and feedback! In case there's something we can help you with, please, reach out to us at hello@spendee.com, we'll be happy to help! ü§ó

content: I used this app for a while, it was great, I got a subscription. Then it stopped working and could no longer access my info at all. I stopped using it for a year due to this flaw and now I am being charged again. I went to cancel and the help center had "we can't help you ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è" (complete with shrug emoji). I ended up finding and cancelling it. I still do not recommend an app that is inconsistent like this. I really wish it was useable though.

content: Regret 5 min after I started the trial. They pulled the money from my account the minute I started the trial. Every single app I have purchased so far takes the money at the end of the trial! In addition I'm not able to connect to Revolut. There's a constant error message that they cannot connect to the bank. I tried several times. I can see my accounts with the correct amounts however no transaction history. At the end I paid to see that there's no connection to the bank. UPDATE 10.01 I successfully managed to add all my bank accounts however i uninstall the app. My reasons: 1. you cannot make a budget with labels. The only option is to use the categories. 2. there's no automatic matching process for transfers between my account. I need to match them manual. 3. I didn't not see a learning process for automatic categorization. My transactions for the past 2 months were wrongly categorized and as most of them are repetitive a learning process would be nice to have. 4. I cannot share bank accounts with family members. Only manually created accounts. This means second family member to connect to my bank accounts with another subscription. For example we have shared accounts and I want to share just the balance. 5. 50% of the bank sync process ended up with errors. 6. I cannot edit anything with status pending. I know that the status is coming from the bank but why I'm not able to change simple things as the category or match the transfer between two accounts? I will give 3 stars as it's good app but they definitely can do more. I found app which better suit my needs. I hope the refunding to be a smooth process as they took the money in the beginning of the trial.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, Ivan! We'll definitely take those suggestions into account and try our best to add the features you've requested. We'll also look into the issues you've reported and will be in touch with you shortly with regards to the refund. :)

content: I've been using the app for nearly a year now and liked it very much. Since the update in December, there have been nothing but problems with the app. It lags, crashes, and doesn't save entries. The option to add to a transaction is also gone now. I get so frustrated as I installed it to help make managing my finances easier, but all I do is wait for every little thing to load, causing a waste of time and energy. I wish the glitches would finally get fixed so I can continue to use and recommend.
replyContent: Hi Gabriela, thanks for the review and feedback. We are glad that you like Spendee.‚ù§Ô∏è Rest be assured that our team is aware of the issues and working hard on speeding up the application and improving it further. Thanks for your patience and understanding. üôè

content: Spendee is at best average - but I'm paying for premium as I think it has the potential to be the best. I have tried and tested every app that works with UK banks, and it has the most reliable sync. It also has the ability to create custom categories for expenses and income. It currently doesn't let you add all budgets together to help judge total spend, nor set targets (for saving), nor predict your expected balance if you hit all budgets successfully. Fingers crossed for the future.
replyContent: Hi, thank you a lot for your review and feedback! We value your suggestions and will be happy to consider them! :) Thanks

content: I have been a happy user for the better part of 5 years. But then Ver.5 was released and everything went downhill from there. The widget is not working anymore, it takes a lot of time to initialize the app, every single time. The hashtag option was brilliant for tracking and it was not character sensitive which was perfect; now we have labels, and from UX perspective it is horrendous to interact with. I wish there was a way to return to an older version and keep on having a fluid experience.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and feedback. We appreciate you being with Spendee for a long time. Our team is working hard on speeding up the app and the widgets are definitely on our wishlist and we will try to add them back soon. Unfortunately, older version will no longer work, in order to avoid any issues, please update your app to the latest version.

content: I've been using this app daily for the past 2 yrs, but after the update I don't feel like using it much longer. Now the app is slow and reliably crashes every few minutes. In the past I loved the speed and reliability as I could record several transactions using short-term memory for the items bought and each price, all while keeping up a conversation with other people. Now that would be difficult as each time I need to wait for the app to recover from crash then initialize for a while.
replyContent: Thank you for this review and sorry for any inconvenience. We're already working on resolving the performance issues, please, bear with us a little longer. üòá

content: I really, really like the app. The charts are nice and the single level of categories keeps it simple. The showstopper and reason I can't use this app though is that you can't assign refunds into expense categories, so refunds for groceries, for example, have to go into an income category which means my groceries total for the month is not accurate. This feels like a fundamental feature to me and more surprisingly, it seems as though this has been done "by design".
