content: 4/14/22: Pretty cute and simple. Kinda wish I could customize things like color scheme, etc. Does what I need it to do üëåüèæ update: I've been using it pretty much religiously since I've started a couple years back. decided to upgrade to the premium, and it's very much worth it. it's not a complex app and helps keep track of my funds. the premium cross-platform saving helps when I'm actively using my bank apps for reconciliation. Great work, team üëèüèæ

Absolutely love this app! The other budgeting apps I've tried are either too complicated or connect to your bank (which is never available in my country). This one's simple, looks nice and super helpful with all the features. I paid for the subscription and it's so worth it. I love that you can keep separate books and accounts, different expense categories, monitor your spending, follow a budget and save a backup. I used to do all this with spreadsheets, this is 100% better and more convenient!

Such a cute app! It's also quite simple to use. You can add a new category or edit the preexisting ones, if I'm not mistaken. Love it! Kinda hope it could add an image so I could just snap a picture of a receipt so I wouldn't forget what the prices are for. But I guess it'd make the app heavier, eh? Anyways, love love!<3

This is the first time I have managed to maintain a detailed expenses chart for so long!! Very well made app..after a few months, i had a rough idea about where I am spending more. And the icons are just so cute !!! The best thing is all of this is free..I might buy the premium version just to encourage the developer even though I don't need it atm. Best money app u will find!!

In love with this app. It's so easy to record my expenses and has a lot of features. Cute and simple. In the end, it also gives your incomes and expenses in a pie chart to compare with. You can customise your expenses as you want (naming and labelling). I would surely recommend this app for especially teens to record their daily expenses. Thank you for reading my reviewüíú

This is the most efficient and useful money management app I've ever used. After using it for about a year, I finally found the premium option which is not timely subscription. The app doesn't even have any ad in free version too so it is quite good with free version too but I am happy to have got premium version mainly for the backup option.

I like the UI (hope you can improve the UI as well, like the padding and icons), very organized and engaging. Hopefully we can also log debts more easily, because currently I just modify the value in my debt category since I can't log an negative value in expenses. This app would be nearly perfect if we can sync data into our google accounts.

YES YES YES. It's cute and very easy to use. I can customize it with cute emojis and icons. Plus it's easy to see where I transfer the money and have an overview look for all of my accounts at my disposal üíï Since it's offline, I can always look back and insert data anytime with an easy click. (I am using the free version and it's still very usable). DEF ONE OF MY FAV APPS ü©∑ I hope the developers' pillow always cold, even in summer.

I frigging love how clean and cute this app is, easy to use UI, no ads, doesn't ask for info it doesn't need, like why do most money tracking apps needs your email, mobile, etc. they make it obvious they sell data to third parties, but this app... it's perfect, how apps used to be like. it also has a premium feature, but you can still use most of the app for free! if the developer sees this, I BEG you make a weight loss tracking app ü•∞ü´∂

I love that you can add some multiple wallet so you can separate the budgets you want to save. It can help also to track the money you expenses and income in every month. It has also a budget planning so you won't exceed from your expenses. It added also the design are so pastel, and cute looking. This is the best suggestions to use.

For me it's the best choice for those who's seeking for financial planning. It's cute to see numerous icon and the colourful theme can be choosen too. It's helpful for me as i have use it for almost a year but it's quite upsetting me because there's no permanent subscription. Overall i can say this is the best app for cutie lover

I can't use it anymore since the last update! It says that I downloaded the app from somewhere else when I definitely downloaded it from the Google Play Store! It prompts me to update directly in the PlayStore, but it doesn't proceed to update the app. Too bad this is the best money organizing app I had! Can I please get assistance in fixing the bug please? Thank you.

Overall a wonderful app that you can get really detailed with. The flaw are annoyances more than anything. The grouping feature is useless and causes an extra click every single time I enter something. The round menu windows cut off category text. There's no bird or small mammal or lizard icon to select for a pet food/ vet expenses.

Love that it's very customizable & offer lots of features. Also very easy to navigate. I just hope there's a Google sign-in feature so that we can have a back up or for when using it on another device. Also hoping for a lifetime subscription. Overall, very cute & fun to use! It's so addicting managing finances now!

I love this app! It's very customizable, cute, and easy to use, even without paying for the subscription. There are some great features with the subscription, too, so I might try it out someday. Been using this app for multiple years now. I love the charts and graphs it gives, the visuals are very helpful for understanding my spending habits and earnings.

It's my go-to tracker, I love everything about it, especially whereby you can have different accounts logs with different currencies, not alot of trackers have that, and it translates it to my local currency.. the only one so far I've come across was Budge. However, Budge kinda hard to navigate, Money+ is straightforward and easy, would be nice if it has AI integrated so it can help me track as well.

GURL! THEY DROPPED A NEW UPDATE FOR THE BUDGETS! AHHHHHHH. It's one of the best thingsssss. But for those trying this out for the first time, I know it's a little finicky at first to find out a way to use it (It was easier for me when I was getting cash as a salary, as to know that I have a bank, and it's all virtual envelopes now with a couple of cash wallets for me lol). But honeyyyy, this is way well worth your time and once you figure out a way to add your wallets? it's got everything.

This is really a great app, but I think it would be better if there were any notes for every expense, so we can describe what kind of expense from the transaction that has no receipt pic. I hope the developer can fix this. Thank you.

Everything is so cute??? And really easy to use. The UI and text warping could be improved though. I JUST WISH IT WAS A ONE TIME PURCHASE AND NOT A SUBSCRIPTION ü•≤ I want to support but I absolutely despise paying monthly or recurring subs.

All rounder appüëç We can add some notes if we want it to be more detailed, choose the person we spent the money for (like your parents, partner, etc), edit the dates and notes, set budgets and saving goals, do calculations, search transactions, even export to excel And there's a reminder everyday so I won't miss to record my expenses Overall it's very helpful for a lazy person like me

Very customizable and beginner-friendly. You can use it offline no worries. It also doesn't shove your face with ads and subscriptions like some other apps like this. Kudos to the devs for this app, it's really good. Keep it up Sirs and Ma'ams ü´°

Dear Money+ Developer I really like your app, but the UI looks dull, and the vintage theme makes it feel outdated and less comfortable to look at. However, your features are the best compared to other apps. I hope you can improve the UI to be brighter and fresher, with white and yellow accents. It would be great if the icons were more colorful and stood out like doodles, making the app easier on the eyes. A good example is the Money Manager app, which has a cute panda theme and a yellow color

This is an amazing app! I haven't found anything else like it, love that it's adorable and extremely functional. Plus they continually update the app and the updates are good and make the app even better each time! I've been using the app for years and have no regrets, I hope the app continues for many years to come!

I have this app installed on my tablet and on my phone. I intend to record transactions on my phone, and I want to see everything on my tablet. I can't find a way to synchronize the information between both. Am I missing s'thing or is not possible?
My favorite expense tracking app, it's cute, good pricing, and they reply same day when you have issues. I recommend it to all my friends and family.

UPDATE: not only did they fix the issue but they responded to my email addressing the fix! i already love the app but the fact that they responded about the issue makes me feel heard! previous 3 star review: "in the new update the font is the same color as the theme, and since the items are now a shade of the theme color, the font color is too identical. It's literally impossible to see what I've written. I rely on this app please fix this."
replyContent: try the new version laterüòä

content: It's always amazing easily to keep tabs on your expense, but it's also make sure you have to plan your budget wisely or you see all red and details of your spending can also be a dangerous reminder lol
Very cute and clean app. Would use it if only can add sub-categories or have group budget. No refund function and cannot add reverse figure in expenses or income.
Very useful. I hope they have some feature where you can also log if your debt is already paid. Like when I paid my credit card using my debit card.

Cute app and easy to used.. Not only helps cash in and out, but it is easy to categorize my expenses and different income, capture and save receipt from expenses,percentage of category expenses, makes it easier to make financial planner for next month. We can make reminder for maximum budget expenses and also budgetting another family.
amazing app. helps me a lot with tracking my income and expenses. it's easy and intuitive to use. and there's no ads whatsoever. i really appreciate that.

Been using this app since mid 2022, very useful, i like how it has many different ways to present information we inputted so we can get a fresh perspective. Various tools to provide detailed ways to record information.

The new budget update is exactly what I needed ‚Äì I even sent feedback about it before, so it feels nice having it now! The app is perfect for tracking my finances, it's also super cute and easy to use! üå∏
the app is good. Except transfers are recorded as both an income and an expense in the trend chart, and you can't delete an account modification.

How to disable the new recommended category groupings? The default ungrouped category was ordered to my preference and the new ai recommended order feature is unwelcome and screwing up with my muscle memory. Get rid of it or let me disable it.

I really love this app. This helps me to save my money and take care of my expenses. Since I used this app I learned to not spend money on useless stuff. And that design is really adorable. I've a lot of fun when I use the app.
Maybe you can add how much the total assets are after we input income or expenses, such as how much it increases from the previous total or how much it decreases from the previous total.

Thank you so much, for allowing to sort recommended & ungrouped expenses/income. I am really thankful that you made the changes. If you won't mind, may I give 1 more suggestion? When we click on the cash/bank/card - "Charts" open, and yes charts are helpful, but most of the time I want to see the payments that I made, and I always have to click on "Details", will it be possible for you to make "Details" open first, and whenever we need- will click on "Charts". if it's possible, please do. Tq
the update has made it so confusing, I miss when you could just put your budget in for each category, the new budget system isn't simple at all which defeats the whole purpose üò≠
They updated it and now it's more difficult altogether to use so I canceled my subscription and I'm deleting the app...
replyContent: We are very sorry that the new version did not bring you enough experience, we will continue to work hard to improve it

content: This is one of the best money tracking app ever. Not only it's really cute and aesthetic but it makes money management like a game. I also love the fact that you can update your amount in cash instead of the ones in your card since most apps can't do that and I use cash more often. Totally recommend!!

Been using this app for more than a year. From all similar apps, Money+ so far is the best one. The user interface is simple, the icons are cute, and the non-premium features are enough for me to track my expenses and incomes. I can easily read the daily, weekly, and monthly report per category and see the percentage of each category. Always recommend this app to my friends.

I've gone through several apps of this kind but I really like this one! Bonus is that it's cute! I haven't run into any restrictions yet. some of the other ones you can only add a certain amount of categories before you have to upgrade so subscription. there is no adds here, and it's very easy to navigate! I absolutely love it!
Good and cute i use this more than 3years.. and buy pro for lifetime subcribe pack.. but now.. i cant use it again.. ü´†
Such a great app for keeping track, I love the icon's. Will definately be joining to support .
The application is good, it can help with bookkeeping and financial management, but unfortunately it is not free.
i love this app. this app has helped me in managing my expenses and has helped me control my impulses in buying things i dont need.
good but why there's no lifetime purchase? yearly subscription for a budget tracker is not ideal for me. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
It's very easy to manage my finances, the cute design makes me want to manage your finances regularly‚ú®
love it, so quick and easy to use, minimal ads also
I'm really enjoying how user friendly the app is. The appearance and functionality are very smooth.
very helpful, easy to use and the design is very cute too
Easy to use, very useful, and absolutely cute.

I really love the app that I bought it. Even with my initial issue about the books when I first bought it in 2021 or 2022, I just couldn't help but buy it. Anyways, the issue about the books was fixed. More power.
The best app for expense tracking. It's very visual, cute and I love the possibility of customization. I ended up purchasing the paid version because it's really great.

I love it ‚ù§Ô∏è Im using the premium version, but there's a lot you can do even without the permium version. The icons are cute, the interface is easy on the eye. And there's a lot of features. I think it'll be really helpful if there was a tutorial available for new users to get familiar with the app and all the features it provides so they can make the most out of it. I'm still a bit clueless on how to use some of the features :,) You gotta sit down and figure out how you'd like to use it

I really like this app!! Cute, clean, easy to maneuver. I just wish there was a setting for reoccuring bills and paychecks. Another great feature that is hard to find is to set an estimated amount, but be able to change the amount in that occurance when paid/received. Too many apps focus on the budget part and graphs when all I really need is the transaction tracking and multiple accounts, which this has!

Cute app that helps organize my money without having to actually link my accounts. Exactly what I was looking for. My only complaint is that you can not delete categories. I can understand that it could potentially mess up some things if you had something connected with it, but if you don't, the option should be there. Or even a way to hide categories? Other than the learning curve (a tutorial would be nice, it took 4 tries to get my credit cards to work), that's the only complaint I have.

I want to love this app, but the reoccurring expenses don't show up and add to the budget or calendar. And the calendar only shows per day instead of overall what you've spent or income you've gotten. It would be easier if the calendar calculated income & expenses and showed that on the days as the month went on like a normal calendar budget, like what you have left after spending and minused that from your income. You also cannot look ahead in the detailed part of the budget.

Really great and cute app. I just wish there was a way to create accounts for savings for different things like projects where we can add a total goal with the period and maybe it can tell us how much we need to save each month, I had to add them as categories of expenses but it isn't exactly what I wanted (if there already is this option please tell me, I'm still exploring the app)

I've been using this close to a month now. So far everything is seamless. I love that it's cute & pink! But you can actually change the colour of the layout too on its settings. But most importantly, it allows me to track my expenditure. And I realise that I'm beginning to be more careful with how I spent my money. I love the Analytics part as well. Very helpful to see my spending in a pie chart! Definitely can see which money goes to which section. So far so good and I'd definitely recommend

Bought the premium. Its good. Just wish it shows the collective amount of cash in each "book" because I use it to keep track of my savings. It's annoying to keep adding it, so it'll be nice to have it track everything in the book rather than just everyday in each book. Again, it's good, but the weird tracking is just a major turn off, for me

Its great so far. At first it was a little confusing without something telling me what everything does and needs. But after a bit of trial and error I figured it out. Only thing that would make it prefect is if it also included cash stuffing. I've been looking for an app that helps keep track of the money on my card without me having to physically draw out the money. Hope for this to change soon.

Currency exchange is not clear as I want to record my expenses from another country too, but everything else is great. No annoying ads, easy input, budgeting and savings tool, spending analysis charts and best of all, premium is not required to access most features. I was a free member for about a year before I decided to purchase just to support and to take this experience further lol !

The best, and cutest app I've used for handling finances. The only thing I want from this is a Shared Book feature, where there can be more than 1 person to modify and add entries. Also, would be nice if you can sync with other devices. Unfortunately, my other device is a Huawei, so I'm not sure if it is possible due to this app being Google-centric.

I really like this app so far, my favorite money tracking app I have downloaded. One thing I would like is if there was a tab for Expenses and Income in the analytics. (Both being in the same diagram, both different colors) so I could see how much I earn vs how much a spend in one photo. Edit: I would love to be able to switch the colors green and red for income and outcome. It make more sense for out color to be red and income to be green. Make it positive that you are making money.
replyContent: hiÔºåyou can change color in settings->more settingsüòä

content: The app is nice. Very cute. But so far I have two things i wish the app had. - I would love it if there was a place you could put down and track your saving goals - There should be a way to hide the amount of money you have. Especially for those of us who use the free version and can't put up security pins or fingerprints But apart form that the okay. Once again, ...very cute.

I like it so far! I didn't find it difficult to use, but when making the exchange rate because i didn't know which it was using as base for the other, so i had to trial and error it untill it worked. As a suggestion, maybe have the currencies available in the book from the begining rather than having the user add accounts with different currencies to unlock them manually and have the first default account be in the chosen currency! That will help the users understand the process more easily :).

It's good so far. Something I would like the app to improve on is budget grouping. Right now we can set our budget limit for each category, but it would be great if we can group those categories. E.g: Makeup, Skincare, Clothing is on different categories but I want to budget my overall expense for these 3 categories under 1 budget category (e.g: Self Care), so I could spend more on makeup or on clothes, as long as the sum of expense didn't go over the budget for "Self Care".

In really enjoy using this app. This app can help you to track your daily expenses and can classified it into alot of category (you can also customize it on your own, but you can only use the default name). You also can write down your previous expenses like one or two days before. If you have daily or monthly expenses that is already fix, you also can set them so it will track automatically. You also can backup your data and change the currency of the money on premium mode

It's so cute! I love the little coin sounds and icons. It's easy to use and you can braked it down by week, month, and year. I like that I can make is feel so personalized to what I want to see. I can nerd out with the stats or just enjoy the cute icons and layout as I enter income and expenses. It has a charts that track overall account amount over time and one that tracked expenses, both are super helpful for visual representation of what I've been doing.

It took me a while to get the hang of it but it's been pretty fun once I did. I like the cute interface, I wish there were more emojis for the accounts. Also, hopefully we could put a conversion rate for the currency because in the analytics it sometimes adds all entries using one currency and it exaggerates the actual amounts spent in the total. overall its a great app especially for its premium cost

I was lucky to find this app! I needed something manual so I could really categorize my spending. However, I had an issue that caused me to stop logging for a month. I get paid sometimes before a month transition and the money I entered at the end of Sept. didn't apply to October. I wasn't sure what to do because I didn't want to label it as extra money. It would be a lot better if the leftover amount from the payment automatically went to the next month.

I absolutely adore this app. It's not very complicated, yet it seems like every time I wish there were a better way to plan or organize my money, this app already has it. It's perfect, save three things. First, income is green, and spending is red. That's weird. Second, there's no way to delete categories you've made, so if you rework a book, your old tabs will always be there. Third, there's no iOS app! I've tried to get friends to download this app, and they never can. Keep up the great work!

I absolutely love this app. Honestly, I was just looking for a basic expense tracker that wouldn't look too boring... didn't expect to find this gem. It works perfectly, and you can customize almost everything in the free version, from the color of the app layout to your budget per month. You can create your own expense categories and choose between lots of cute icons. You can also add multiple accounts and set different currencies for each one. And it gives u statistics for everything! Try it!

the interface is easy to use, it has a built-in calculator. there are a lot of cute icons that you can use to customise almost every button and you can also choose a theme colour. the app doesn't seem to track you (unlike many others, i used duckduckgo's app tracking protection to determine that). you can backup locally.

This app is very cute to look at and easy to use. There's lots of options for customization. If there's one criticism I have, it's that I wish there was an option to give more detail about expenses, so for example that I could both put an expense in the "home" category and then leave a note that it was for rent/safety deposit/utilities, etc. It would also be nice to see some more diversity in the skintones of the emojis :)

Very aesthetic and therefore encouraging to use, user friendly, and almost all the features I am interested in are free to use. The only paid feature I would use would be extra books. The only flaw I have noticed is that there is no way to clear an entire book if you only have one (as in free plan), so if you want to "start fresh" you must delete every entry individually, there should be a way to select all. Otherwise, a very good app, thanks!

I've always wanted a money tracking app that didn't need to connect to my bank and all the extra things. I can keep track of my wallet and any accounts I want with ease now! Just a quick look and i can see how much money i have in every form and i can easily see what it's being spent on and made from. I'm going to buy the lifetime version eventually but this app is perfect and cute as hell as a plus. Not to mention I've caught 2 fraudulent charges just because the numbers didn't match the app.

Cute design. Easy to understand and intriguing interface. You can keep track of your expenses, check the analytics, add new categories, new book, new bank/account/card, and customize it as you wish. A lot of stuffs can be modified and specialized whenever you add new expenses and even for past expenses. And the best part is it's for free! Great app. Recommended.

Just started using it and the free version is absolutely amazing, gives waaaay more than any other app would and has zero ads. Straight to the point, does what it's supposed to do, I have more features to go through and figure out. Definitely would love to know about a way to connect other people from the household to one account (multiple devices) and maybe an option to not extract money from particular wallet sections (if you're writing a cash expense for someone else in the family).

Really loving the app. Paid for the premium and I have been using it for two months now! Except for switching between Jan and Feb, would be great if it's the arrow kind to move between the months than to open a whole calendar and randomly picking a date just to get into that month (since it doesn't even go to that date but you have to go through the whole list anyway). Also, would be great if you can move the pencil button a little to the center since it blocks the amount, especially the last.

I love this app! It offers quite a range of selections, making it very easy to protocol and budget your money. It's also very cute and aesthetically appealing. There is a limitation on categories and other functions in the free version, however, premium isn't expensive either so it's affordable if someone wishes to use those functions. I do wish that there was a way to share or give access on certain accounts to your partner. If it was a premium feature I'd definitely use it!

I'm enjoying this app so far. Seeing what I've spent and the trend graph of daily expenses is very insightful. I love the ui design too, it makes it feel fun, like you're playing a game. However, it may not be for everyone if you don't like data entry. I find it fun to enter the details for each transaction and match it to my bank, but it could easily become tedious if that's not for you. One feature I'd like is a way to save templates for common, but random transactions that aren't automatic.

I honestly really love this app! It's both really aesthetic and practical, it really helps me keep track of my money flow and expenses in a cute way! My only complaint is that I can't change the day the week starts with, kinda throws me off that I can't set Monday as the first day of the week, other than that great! Tho if you do end up downloading it, keep in mind that the backup is premium only, but at least they also offer a one-time purchase, tho when I first got the app it was way cheaper

Super great I've always loved the simplicity but functionality of Money+. Three things though: Orange instead of red *just noticed that my older transfers are neutal color... I will double check if this was user error.* Also if you could duplicate a book to make it easier to start a new one versus typing everything out again and thirdly a savings section, where you can keep track of saving for something based on how much goes into a specific account. Other than that just great! üòéüòÅüòÅ

Super cute and functional! This app is wonderful and easy to use. I love how cute all the icons are. We have 4cc, 3 checking/saving, and cash. I got all the numbers to match and a month's worth of purchases listed pretty quickly! Only things I would like added would be an icon for theatre expenses (masks or stage) and I would love more men icons to represent my fiance. Or a merman! I'd also love another yellow colour, maybe a pastel. Love the app so much Can't wait to spend more so I can log it!

Looked so cute, but doesn't allow inputing expenses besides current month, which makes it completely useless. Unsure what the point of a budget app is when you can't include card expenses (which are charged into the next month, at least in my country, not sure if this is yet another app only for Americans) and thus can't see into the future. Immediate uninstall.
I am just using it to track my personal finances - it's free and a surprisingly little amount of ads and very well made. I would recommend, if this is what you need from an app.

Currently using the app to monitor my expenses, so far everything is clean and easy to get to know. My only problem so far has been when I inputed any amount wrong, it messes up the whole thing considering I use the app to monitor may on hand cash and digital bank acc. Things that I would like to be considered be added in the app, a feature deleting categories for the expenses, income etc., adjustable size for the add button (it covers the amount or item name currently).
I love it! I've had it a few years now and have had no problems. the layout is simple. Customization to my needs was perfect. i use it to buget and track my tips and side work!

If I can use this more than a month, I will buy the life time upgrade. The theme color that I can choose, and the template is so beautiful. And I have no disturbing ads till now. It's so great and catching that it atracks my attention too much and that maybe it's the main reason why I keep logging in it and updating my expenses more than any app that I used to download. Great job so far developers. üòåüôèüåπ

I love this app and the way it's set up. It doesn't actually link to your accounts, you don't need any routing or account info. You just enter the amount in each of your accounts and start entering your expenses and incomes as you go! The analytics are super helpful, and it really helps me keep track of what I could be better at spending money on. And making my own categories is ü§åüèª I didn't really need to upgrade, but I did so that I could back up and export the information when/if needed

I absolutely love this budgeting app! I‚Äôve downloaded, deleted, and redownloaded it multiple times over the years, using it when I've had a job. Recently, I redownloaded it again for my new job, and it‚Äôs been incredibly helpful in tracking my spending, managing my income, and helping me save for a car and trips. It‚Äôs not only effective but also super cute!

4/15/25: God I still love this app so much. Absolutely recommend premium if you don't already have it. Never change <3 ‚ô•Ô∏é 12/31/21: Love it so much! This app helps me keep track of my finances and makes me feel more responsible. Not to mention it's cute! <3
I loved using the app and hit the maximum number of free categories to use. So I went to delete a previous category to make room for a new one and it didn't allow me to without paying :/

Not only is this app super cute and also has an amazingly low subscription, but it has helped me organize my bills greatly. The customization for everything is amazing aswell. I love the automatic billing cycles. I use it for everything; my bills, my card payments, my deposits, etc. I dont have to worry about manually inputting all of my expenses. It also gives me option to adjust prices in transactions. Theres so much more to it. Best finance organizer app!

Excellent free app. Allows you to create as many accounts as you want and it does not have intrusive adds. Have not even seen in-app adds so far. Cute design and interface. Thinking about going pro just because of the extra books and Drive backup but honestly I don't think I necessarily need it. Best money expense/income tracker I've found so far

Great apps, has been used it 4 months. But suddenly it is feel the apps become slower. I do uninstall and also restart my phone. But i still have issue lagh at least from this week, maybe because the update?
I would like the option to add future expenses and income as well please!

This was really cute and easy to use, but my only complaint (kind of a big one) the calculations were always off by 5 dollars and some change. I kept all my reciepts, tracked all of my income and expenses the moment they happened, and still came up short or over. Budgeting down to the penny is very important to me because i am low income. But hopefully this gets fixed in the future!

This app is good for those who want to track expenses. I notice the income that I input is not carried forward to the next month when I checked under month tab as it considered as zero as a new month. If I want to check the balance of the income, I need to check under annual. Doesnt make sense since you're monitoring months. There should be a guide to use this app.
This is such a good app I highly recommend it to everybody. Tbh I've never used such an app which is useful and cute at the same time. I love the art style. It's a really good app!

I find this app to be really useful when budgeting and I like how easy it is to learn how to use. A feature that might be nice to add is one that allows you to create a monthly payment or a saves lot so you can save frequent purchases, so instead of having to type out my rent each time I can schedule it or simply press the frequent purchase slot I made. I see there is a calendar that could make that happen, but it only allows me to make notes for past purchases.

The app seems simple to use, but it's a bit confusing at first. The expenses are in green when they should be in red, and income is in red when it should be in green for clarity. Also, it doesn't subtract expenses from income, just adds it all together. It's a cute app, though it isn't perfect.

It's amazing so far but it'll be useful to add notes to each expense youre accounting for because you'd really want to know what you used it for when checking back the analysis. That's the purpose of keeping a record. Example: Lots of expenses can be categorized as Travel...but travel to where? Categorized snacks, but to who? Yourself? Your daughter? I think you got the picture. Adding notes when you're accoutning for new expenses everyday would be a huge help! Thanks for reading! ‚ô°

Bought premium, easily best money app. I'd love to see: - a pie chart in the analytics tab that includes both income and expenses - option to change colors of different categories in the pie chart view - weird that receivable accounts (money that hasn't yet been received) are included in total assets. I don't want to hide the wallet but don't like that money someone owes me is included in my current total when I don't actually have that money, and option to not include it hides it from main view
easiest tracker to use, just amazeballs seriously can we have themes tho too cutely design gets old to fast
Very good, easy to use, and the color is super cute too
Really helps me a lot tracking my expenses and helping me to budget and save

I love this app so much! I able to track my money, spending, and saving. The app is also simple and colourful. It also comes with a lot of option and can be organised according to how we wanted. And of course it doesn't have ads! We can also create another book. If you afford to pay for premium, go for it. It's a good investment. But it's a choice, don't worry. It's all good even without paying.

DO NOT BUY!! I purchased the premium package so I could use the periodic feature. I have since found out that the periodic payments do not show up on your budget until after the date of the periodic payment. A budget app and bills don't show until the date has past! What a useless app! What a waste of money! The developers were unhelpful and wouldn't refund for this stupid app.

It's cute and easy. But I have to give it 3 stars. It's always prioritise my other email that I didn't purchase the premium on, so I have to logout that email, restore the premium purchase, then re-login. Also, the ledger just adding up the amount without exchanging the currency even if I use different currency.

IT'S SUPER CUTE, just like its name. I thought that it just has pink colour for the theme but you can change the colour theme whatever you want and it's in free version! Supper recommended for everyone who like cute icons etc. But for me it's kinda too much and makes me confused. Maybe it's just because I'm not used to it.

I don't give it 5 stars bc I would like to be able to change the order of expenses and such manually, rn the order can only be changed by date. And if the order is wrong sometimes the final amount of money is different. But overall I like it, it's not hard to learn to use it, it's pretty intuitive and the pics for categories are so cute!!!

The newest update ruined the app. You can't see the expenses, or they're super faint and hard to see. Same with the name of your bills. This app is my everyday go-to, so I hope this issue is fixed fast
replyContent: I'm very sorry, could you please send me a screenshot? If it is a problem, we will fix it as soon as possible. You can contact us in More-Feedback.

content: everything is very cute and the app is very simple once you figure it out! im using the app for a trend, and it's still very useful! Its good at keeping things organized, and you can create and edit categories (what you spend money on, what you get money from) there's even pie charts that show expenses and income. you can also add another account to switch between by paying for everything. there's also no ads! this is a very good app!! track those dabloons~
Easy to use and useful for daily life! thank you

So far, I like the app and it's cute. However, I would like to have an option to select future dates for expenses, this is useful for future bill planning. It'd also be great if custom entries would move over to new books, I have to re-add them. I get paid every two weeks and want my budget to lineup with that.
I just started using this app. I like the cutesy design, and it works pretty well. Thank you!
